resources.string:
Welcome to Morph!
 
Follow these three steps to create your first Morph:
 
1.	Click the new image icon to select the background image. The final image will have the same proportions as this image.
 
2.	Click the new image icon to select the foreground image.
 
3.	Use the slider to adjust the amount of blending you want. That's it!

 
To make even more impressive creations, use the other features that Morph offers:
 
Click on the edit symbol to edit either the background or foreground image, using Aviary's powerful image editing software.
 
Use the merge icon to select the current morphed image and set it as the background. You can then select another foreground image to morph more than two images.
 
Pressing the cancel button will delete all images in your current project, allowing you to begin a new Morph.
 
The save icon will save the current Morph to your gallery.
 
If needed, you can switch the background and foreground images with the click of a button.
 
Share your creation via social media by pressing the share image icon.

 
Tips and Tricks:
 
Click on the thumbnails as an alternate way of adding or changing the images.
 
Press and hold the thumbnails to edit either the background or the foreground.
 
Pinch to zoom in on the image, and drag your finger to move the image around.
 
Press and hold on the image as a shortcut to merge the images together.
 
Go to the settings menu to select from a variety of options, including where you want to get your images from.
 
Thanks for using Morph!


 
If you find Morph helpful, please be sure to rate it in the Play Store!
 
If you are having issues with the app, or have suggestions to make Morph better, please email your feedback to morphapp@gmail.com

 
Developer: Nikhil Rao
